cta.title: Build on Solid Ground
cta.subtitle: Partner with Soiltec for expert piling and foundation solutions

faq.q1: What piling methods do you use?
faq.a1: We offer bored piles, driven piles, micro piling, and diaphragm walls depending on the site conditions and structural requirements.
faq.q2: Do you provide soil investigation services?
faq.a2: Yes, we conduct thorough geotechnical investigations including borehole drilling, SPT testing, and soil analysis.
faq.a3: Absolutely. Soiltec is Dubai Municipality-approved and operates in full compliance with local and international safety standards.
faq.q4: Can you work with existing contractors?
faq.a4: Yes, we collaborate with civil contractors, architects, and consultants to ensure seamless integration with ongoing construction.
faq.q5: What type of projects do you handle?
faq.a5: We specialize in foundations for residential towers, commercial complexes, infrastructure, and industrial facilities.
faq.q6: How do I request a quote or consultation?
faq.a6: Simply click 'Request a Site Visit' or contact us directly. Our engineers will visit your site for assessment and provide a detailed proposal.
faq.q7: Do you handle shoring and excavation support?
faq.a7: Yes, we offer a complete range of excavation support systems including contiguous pile walls and secant pile shoring.
